title: Hour 2: Ime Udoka
description:
Amin Elhassan joins the show to discuss the reporting around the Ime Udoka situation in Boston as he potentially faces suspension and to react to Robert Sarver's statement as he will explore selling the Suns. Then, it's Thursday Thunder as we give the audience top tier, elite, flawless gambling advice.
